Module hashtreesig.main
Package htjsw

Class Merkle

java.lang.Object
htjsw.Merkle
public class Merkle extends Object
Class that contains both the Hashtree structure and Signature data

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    Merkle.ConcatException
    custom Exception class for concatenation processes thrown if the concatenation process glitches
    private static class 
    Merkle.CustomMerkDeserializer
    Custom Deserializer class for deserializing previously saved signed trees for the sake of extracting separate signatures
    private static class 
    Merkle.CustomMerkSerializer
    Custom JSON Serializer class for serializing the relevant info into JSON format for writing into file
    private static class 
    Merkle.HashTree
    Hashtree structure class contains a 3-D Array of bytes

      public Merkle() throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      Constructor. initiates Lists, instantiates Factories and sets base values for closed, initiated (both false)
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if I misspelled one of the Algorithms

  • Method Details

    • getSignature

      @Nullable public @Nullable com.nimbusds.jose.util.Base64URL getSignature()
      Getter for signature
      Returns:
      ecdsa signature over root hash (SHA256) encoded as Base64 URL

      X.509 certificate encoded in Base64

    • getStatus

      public int getStatus()
      Getter for Status of Object
      Returns:
      -1 if uninitialised, 0 if initiated but not closed, 1 if closed

    • lookup

      public int lookup​(byte[] msg)
      Returns the order index, aka what turn it is added into the tree when inserting all the messages (starting at 0)
      Parameters:
      msg - message to search for
      Returns:
      order index of the given message in this tree, or -1 if it is not contained

    • add

      public void add​(byte[] msg) throws IllegalStateException
      add node to leaves
      Parameters:
      msg - raw bytes
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this structure is already closed

    • addAll

      public void addAll​(Collection<byte[]> list) throws IllegalStateException
      bulk add nodes to leaves
      Parameters:
      list - list of raw byte-array messages to sign
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this structure is already closed

    • closeAndSign

      public void closeAndSign() throws IllegalStateException, NoSuchAlgorithmException
      close and sign, generating tree and signature attribute
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this structure is already closed or has not been initialised for signing
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if I have a typo in my algs

    • concat

      static byte[] concat​(byte[] left, byte[] right) throws Merkle.ConcatException
      concatenate byte arrays (order left to right) into one
      Parameters:
      left - left bytes
      right - right bytes
      Returns:
      resulting byte array
      Throws:
      Merkle.ConcatException - if there is a glitch during concatenation

    • concatHash

      public static byte[] concatHash​(byte[] left, byte[] right) throws Merkle.ConcatException, NoSuchAlgorithmException
      concatenate two byte arrays (left to right order) and SHA-256-hash the result
      Parameters:
      left - left bytes
      right - right bytes
      Returns:
      byte array of size 32, containing the hash over the concatenated input bytes
      Throws:
      Merkle.ConcatException - if there is a glitch during concatenation
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if I misspelled SHA-256

    • getTreeJSON

      public String getTreeJSON() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      fetches tree instance serialized into JSON string
      Returns:
      JSON String containing tree structure containing nodes as a JSON Array
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if serialization fails

    • getPath

      public String[] getPath​(byte[] msg) throws IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException, Merkle.ConcatException
      Getter for the Path to root along which a given message can be found's Neighbours in the Hashtree
      Parameters:
      msg - message to search for
      Returns:
      Array of Base64-URL-Strings representing each hash
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if this structure has yet to be closed
      Merkle.ConcatException - if the Concatenation glitches
      IllegalArgumentException

    • serialize

      public String serialize() throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException, IllegalStateException
      serialize ur signed tree into a JSON String
      Returns:
      JSON String rep containing the certificate, root signature, contained messages and the hashtree
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if I fucked up
      IllegalStateException

    • fromJSON

      public static Merkle fromJSON​(String jsonString) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Build a new Instance from the data saved to a JSON String
      Parameters:
      jsonString - JSON String
      Returns:
      closed instance (no key data, only certificate)
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - if I fucked up
